snippet.title: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn | BTS | Composing Vengeance
snippet.description:
Learn more about the music in Flintlock from Eric Hillman, our composer for the game. 

What decisions did Eric make when composing the music for combat, and how does it vary when battling against the Gods?  

Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn is out this Summer! 

Wishlist on...

Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/store/p/flintlock-the-siege-of-dawn/9PBBQHX6V3PJ 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1832040/Flintlock_The_Siege_of_Dawn/ 
Playstation: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10004425 
Epic : https://store.epicgames.com/p/flintlock-the-siege-of-dawn-210044
